title: Basic math trivia game with smartphone
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to create a basic math trivia game with a smartphone.

Select **SmartphoneOrientation** to access to the data of the accelerometer sensor of your smartphone

![SmartphoneOrientation](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/SmartphoneOrientation-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Press again on 'Devices', 'Add device to system' and select **InteractiveWriteDraw** to create in your device an InteractiveWriteDraw

![InteractiveWriteDraw device](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/InteractiveWriteDraw-Item.png)
Click on _Open in this device_ to open the InteractiveWriteDraw locally

Press ![create-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Variables/create-variable.png) and create three variables 'number1', 'number2', 'result'; each of the first two variables will store a number, and the variable 'result' will store the result of the sum of the two numbers
Move ![create-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Variables/set-variable.png) to the workspace for the three variables

Use the ![create-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Math/random-integer-component.png) to set the number variables as in the figure below

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/basic-math-game/set-numbers.png)

Use the ![create-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Math/basic-operations-component.png), the ![set-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Variables/set-variable.png) and the ![variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Variables/variable.png) to set the result variable as in the figure below

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/basic-math-game/set-result.png)

Move the **write** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/basic-math-game/write-text.png), you can set the position of the text with coordinates, the size of the text, and the colour of the text

Use the previous component,![create-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/basic-math-game/create-text-with.png) and ![set-variable](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Text/text-component.png) to write a math trivia, in this case a sum trivia, as in the figure below

![text](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/basic-math-game/text.png)
